services.name: Landscape Design
services.longDescription: Our custom landscape design services bring your vision to life. We create beautiful, functional outdoor spaces tailored to your style and local climate.

services.name: Hardscaping
services.longDescription: Add structure and elegance with hardscaping. We design and install patios, walkways, retaining walls, and fire pits using high-quality stone and pavers.

services.name: Tree Service
services.longDescription: Maintain the health and safety of your trees. Our certified arborists offer trimming, pruning, and removal services to protect your property and enhance curb appeal.

services.name: Irrigation Systems
services.longDescription: Efficient watering is key to a healthy landscape. We design, install, and repair irrigation systems to ensure your plants get the right amount of water.

services.name: Lawn Maintenance
services.longDescription: Keep your lawn lush and healthy with our weekly maintenance. Mowing, edging, and fertilization ensure your yard looks its best throughout the season.

seo.metaDescription: SAmazon provides professional landscaping services in Rancho Santa Margarita, CA. 10+ years experience. Licensed & insured. Call for a free estimate!
seo.metaKeywords: landscaping, Rancho Santa Margarita, CA, landscape design, hardscaping, tree service, irrigation systems, lawn maintenance
